0.name: AlphaFold2+MD
0.description: Using AlphaFold2_mmseqs2 to generate protein model + MD simulation using AMBER to generate topology and to build simulation box
0.author: Arantes P.R.

1.name: AMBER
1.description: Using AMBER to generate topology and to build the simulation box
1.author: Arantes P.R.

2.name: CHARMM
2.description: Using inputs from CHARMM-GUI solution builder
2.author: Arantes P.R.

3.name: Protein-Ligand simulations
3.description: Using AMBER to generate topology and to build the simulation box and for the ligand using GAFF2 or OpenFF force fields
3.author: Arantes P.R.

4.name: Using AMBER Inputs
4.description: Using inputs from AMBER suite of biomolecular simulation program
4.author: Arantes P.R.

5.name: Using GROMACS Inputs
5.description: Using inputs from GROMACS biomolecular simulation package (AMBER, CHARMM and OPLS force fields are compatible)
5.author: Arantes P.R.

6.name: Molecular Dynamics using Gromacs
6.description: MD Protein Simulation at 10ns using Gromacs 2021 GPU
6.author: Girinath G Pillai

7.name: RoseTTAFold
7.description: RoseTTAFold: Accurate prediction of protein structures and interactions using a three-track neural network.
7.author: Minkyung et al.

8.name: AlphaFold complexes
8.description: The functionality for complex prediction (including going beyond dimers)
8.author: Minkyung Baek and Yoshitaka Moriwaki

9.name: AlphaFold2 mmseqs2
9.description: Easy to use protein structure and complex prediction using AlphaFold2 and Alphafold2-multimer.
9.author: Mirdita et al.

10.name: AlphaFold2 batch
10.description: Easy to use AlphaFold2 protein structure (Jumper et al. 2021) and complex (Evans et al. 2021) prediction using multiple sequence alignments generated through MMseqs2.
10.author: Mirdita et al.

11.name: AlphaFold2 advanced
11.description: This notebook modifies deepmind's original notebook (before AlphaFold-Multimer existed) to add experimental support for modeling complexes (both homo and hetero-oligomers), option to run MMseqs2 instead of Jackhmmer for MSA generation and advanced functionality.
11.author: Mirdita et al.

12.name: Rapid protein stability prediction
12.description: Rapid protein stability prediction using deep learning representations.
12.author: Blaabjerg et al.

13.name: ESMFold
13.description: ESMFold (Evolutionary Scale Modeling) by Meta AI.
13.author: S. Ovchinnikov
